assetProfile.address2: 2nd Floor B/h Times of India Ashram Road
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Gyscoal Alloys Limited manufactures and sells stainless and mild steel long products in India. The company's stainless steel products include equal angle bars, bright round bars, flat bars, flats, and ingots; and mild steel products comprise mild steel angle bars. Its products are primarily used in the construction of chemical plants, pharmaceutical plants, building construction, railways, and other sectors for structural purposes. The company also exports its products to Thailand, Bangladesh, Vietnam, Kenya, Malaysia, Yemen, the United Arab Emirates, the Philippines, Egypt, Indonesia, Ireland, Jordan, Iran, Russia, Morocco, Turkey, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, Belgium, Italy, Spain, Germany, Brazil, Ecuador, Guatemala, Syria, Singapore, and Myanmar. Gyscoal Alloys Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
